sourcesContent:
import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {fas, faEye, faUserCircle, faEyeSlash} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; @Component({ selector: 'app-auth', templateUrl: './auth.component.html', styleUrls: ['./auth.component.scss'] }) export class AuthComponent implements OnInit { userCircleIcon = faUserCircle; showPassword = false; eyeIcon = faEye; slashIcon = faEyeSlash; ngOnInit(): void { } }
